report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-29582 Linux Kernel Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-29582 Linux Kernel Vulnerability
text: Linux Kernel could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a use-after-free due to a race condition in the io_uring timeouts function. By executing a specially-crafted program, an authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privilege to root on the sy
